No. 2439/58  -  THURSDAY,  JUNE  05,  2025
EXTRAORDINARY
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
(Published by Authority)
PART I : SECTION (I) — GENERAL
Government Notifications
1A - PG 7143 - 604 (06/2025) 
This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk
L.D.-B. 9/73 (XII) (A)
THE FAUNA  AND  FLORA  PROTECTION  ORDINANCE  (CHAPTER 469)
Order under Subsection (2) of Section 2
BY virtue of the powers vested in me by subsection (2) of section 2 of the Fauna and Flora Protection Ordinance 
(Chapter 469), I, Hettithanthri Patabendige Dammika, Minister of Environment do by this Order declare the area of land 
described in the Schedule hereto to be a Sanctuary for the purposes of the aforesaid Ordinance and further declare that such 
Sanctuary shall be known as the “Nikkandupola Sanctuary”. 
 Hettithanthri Patabendige Dammika,
 Minister of Environment.
Colombo,
04th June, 2025.
SCHEDULE
Limits of the Area of Land Comprising The Nikkandupola Sanctuary
  All that area of land depicted in the map of the Department of Wildlife Conservation dated 02/05/2025, containing 
in extent 13.14 hectares, situated within the streamflow, stream banks and riparian corridors of the stream flowed from 
Rabbidigala to Hapugoda in the Village of Nikkandupola, Galapitamada in the Warakapola Divisional Secretary's Division 
in the Administrative District of Kegalle in the Sabaragamuwa Province and bounded by the GPS Coordinates specified 
hereunder, (Mode of Survey: GPS Coordinates EPSG: 5234):- 

<!-- page 2 -->
